sourcesContent:
import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import { Pagination, Autoplay, Navigation, Controller } from 'swiper'; import 'swiper/css'; import './cards.sass'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const Cards = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); const [swiper, updateSwiper] = useState(null); const [swiperThumbs, updateSwiperThumbs] = useState(null); const gallerySwiperParams = { spaceBetween: 24, slidesPerView: 1, modules: [Pagination, Autoplay, Navigation, Controller], autoplay: { delay: 3500 }, pagination: { el: '.swiper-pagination', type: 'bullets', clickable: true, }, loop: false, navigation: { prevEl: '.arrow-prev', nextEl: '.arrow-next' }, }; const thumbnailSwiperParams = { spaceBetween: 36, slidesPerView: 4, modules: [Controller], slideToClickedSlide: true, }; useEffect(() => { if (swiper && swiperThumbs) { swiper.controller.control = swiperThumbs; swiperThumbs.controller.control = swiper; } }, [swiper, swiperThumbs]); return (
{t('top')}
{t('download')} PDF
); }; export default Cards;
